name: quick-jump
title: Quick Jump
description: Quick access to your team's Git repositories, dashboards, databases, and internal tools.
author: akadir

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.subtitle: Quick Jump
commands.description: Search and open your defined links.

preferences.name: jsonFilePath
preferences.title: JSON File Path
preferences.description: Path to the JSON file containing your URLs and groups.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
